content:
wmaethner commented on Issue #257:

Yeah this seems easier in the long run to maintain, although I still like the idea of creating releases each time we do publish a major version (or a ballot like we already have for the May ballot). They will be nice to have as a backup and maybe we do find a way to use them in the future.

isaacvetter commented on Issue #257:

Hey @wmaethner - agreed! I did also create a "draft" STU1 release this morning, see here: https://github.com/HL7/fhircast-docs/releases

Hopefully this should remind us to apply it as part of our eventual publish.
